name: SleepTime

”Alexa, open sleep time”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep time
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Time is the perfect Alexa skill for creating a peaceful and calming environment. Whether you want to drift into sleep, unwind after a long day, or enhance your meditation practice, this skill offers a versatile selection of relaxing audio experiences, including soothing stories, tranquil soundscapes, and guided meditations tailored to your relaxation needs.

⭐ PREMIUM FEATURES ⭐

• Diverse Audio Library: Enjoy a wide array of calming options such as Gentle Ocean Waves, Whispering Forest Breezes, Relaxing Rain Showers, Guided Meditation Tracks, and Serene Bedtime Stories.
• Customizable Experience: Set the playback duration or request specific stories, sounds, or meditations to be featured in future updates.
• High-Quality Audio: Premium recordings ensure each sound, melody, and voice is perfectly soothing for an immersive experience.
• Regular Updates: New and unique content is added regularly to keep your experience fresh and engaging.
• Versatile Usage: Whether for restful sleep, deep relaxation, or focused meditation, Sleep Time is your perfect companion.

💫 Let the calming sounds, meditative guidance, and serene stories of Sleep Time guide you to tranquility and rejuvenation. Sweet dreams and happy relaxing! 💫
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
